name: The Travelyan Home
description:
“Lovecraft would surely be pleased seeing that his writings have inspired even text-based games to such an elaborate extent. Travelyan Home proves that eye candy is not required for a good scare.” - I DO BEST

Follow the path of a lost soul pacing the grounds of an old and mysterious mansion as he seeks the answers of what brought him there.

Introducing a unique investigation system to discover clues, items and hidden texts that progress the story and help the player uncover the secrets of the mansion.

Discover what lies beyond the veil


An absorbing storyline inspired by the masterful works of Poe, Lovecraft, Ashton Smith and others with over 160,000 written words to be discovered in descriptions, clues and hidden journals. (Optional accessible font included)

*Over 50 rooms to explore and investigate with unique settings, intrigues and characters.

*Four characters to select from with unique backgrounds and skills

*6 different endings based on the player’s decisions throughout the game

Choose your story


Unique game mechanics combining role-playing and survival horror elements, offering a tactical gameplay where every action matters.

* Randomised events and encounters to solve, making every playthrough a unique experience

*A card-based item system with over 70 different items to help the player face the perils of the forgotten home

*A fast-paced combat system that tests your skills against what lurks in the shadows
